page.title: 16POPULATION IN KINGS NORTON
page.content: Family survey of St.Paul's School.68 answers showed:churchgoers 27.Nephews and nieces 14.This shows that many of our relatives live in the same area. Brothers and sisters at work= 12. R.C. Children who have taken first holy com- munion=93 confirmed = 39.In our area there are 1288 children at primary sch- ools 218 at{ St.Pauls}.450 at Primrose 222 at KingÂ£s Norton J.I and 300 at Broadmeadow.There are no secondary sch- ools. On leaving St Pauls children go in September'85.16 will go to St Thomas Aquinas,7 to Archbishop Mast- erson,6 to Primrose Hill, 1 to St Pauls,1 to Turves Green. The children who come to our school live in these areas found from a survey of 63 children. {Hawksley 11, Primrose 6, K.N. 21, Pool Farm,22 Stirchley 1 and Kings Heath 2}.By Children of St Pauls J/I School.
